sense.name: hire for work or assistance
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[theme] ENLIST (PP) NP1[agent] ENLIST NP2[theme] (PP)
sense.examples: Drug-sniffing dogs were enlisted to expose the smuggling ring. A new technology has been enlisted in the search for life on mars. NOAA enlisted amateurs in a search for new planets. I enlisted in the company for the experience.

sense.name: (cause to) join the military
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent[human]] ENLIST NOTE: This is a subsense of sense 1 that applies only to the 'military' frame.
sense.examples: He enlisted when he was only 18. My daughter enlisted in the Air Force in North Carolina. John Cambpell enlisted in 1918 but never saw service.
